contentfulPodcast.episodeName: Discussing the myths surrounding homelessness with Professor Steve Joordens

shortDescription.shortDescription: Ayush and Zaynab discuss homelessness myths with Dr. Joordens, a Psychology professor at the University of Toronto Scarborough.

content.value: In this episode of Beyond the Blankets, we uncover some myths that are widespread regarding the homeless community by featuring a special guest! We are pleased to welcome Professor Steve Joordens, a professor at the University of Toronto Scarborough, to the podcast! This episode, we cover misconceptions including how homelessness is considered a choice, how the age demographic of this community is distributed, and how current policy puts the homeless at a disadvantage. We also cover potential ways to help the homeless as a society.Â
